I’m @ThairDamascus. Thank you for sharing my story. #ShareHumanity http://t.co/UiQx83ngDX
I couldn’t have made it without my friends. Patience and courage always reward in the end! @Amaltikva @jakob_vf http://t.co/lxyHCQFZco
I’ve arrived in #Berlin and applied for asylum, fingers crossed! #Germany #ShareHumanity
After a long and dangerous road trip I arrive in #Munich, the entry point for many migrants. #ShareHumanity http://t.co/FYslkpNaki
I’m heading for #Germany - what I hope is the final leg of this long journey. I have to travel by car to avoid being caught. #ShareHumanity
I’ve travelled 3248KM so far. It’s hard to say goodbye to Italy but it’s not my best hope for asylum. #ShareHumanity
I have no passport, no money, and no clothes. Nothing. But I am happy to be alive. #Italy #ShareHumanity
On a boat to Italy with 234 other refugees and migrants. Their strength is unbelievable. #ShareHumanity http://t.co/srpe6sVn9E
Paid US$2000 for the crossing from Alexandria to Italy. Many don’t make it but I need to take the risk. #ShareHumanity
It’s 2 am can’t sleep. Police were just here at @Amaltikva’s house asking if she is hosting Syrians. #ShareHumanity
My passport was stolen and I can’t get a new one so I cannot get a visa to stay in #Egypt. #ShareHumanity
The security situation in #Egypt is worsening - a curfew is now in place. I need to move on.
I’m helping refugees who are struggling with basic needs. @SinaNetwork #ShareHumanity http://t.co/t2ISaFMdPA
I no longer feel safe in Lebanon, a group of us will leave for #Egypt tomorrow. #ShareHumanity
Syrian refugees now make up 1 in 4 people in #Lebanon. #ShareHumanity
Yesterday a bomb went off in the street near me, wounding lots of people. #ShareHumanity https://t.co/5gJmHssCN7
#Syria is filled with tension and fighting. I’m not sure what the future holds for me here. #Damascus #ShareHumanity
Making new friends at the Arab International University in Damascus. #Syria #ShareHumanity http://t.co/3kqEMzzZLH
My feed won’t be the same over the next day. It’s for a very special cause. #ShareHumanity
